title: Smart Data models - NEFFunction schema
description: This IOC represents the NEF function in 5GC. For more information about the NEF, see 3GPP TS 23.501.

sBIFQDN.description: Property. The FQDN of the registered NF instance in the service-based interface.. Model:'https://schema.org/String'

sNSSAIList.description: Property. List of S-NSSAIs the managed object is capable of supporting. (Single Network Slice Selection Assistance Information) An S-NSSAI has an SST (Slice/Service type) and an optional SD (Slice Differentiator) field.. Model:'https://schema.org/String'
